    • findIdentity

      Optional<IdentityModel> findIdentity(byte[] certificate) throws VitamClientInternalException, InternalSecurityException
      Find Identity
      Parameters:
      certificate -
      Returns:
      an Optional describing the IdentityModel, otherwise return an empty Optional.
      Throws:
      VitamClientInternalException - in case of client exception
      InternalSecurityException - in case of internal security exception
